name: Mr. Firefighter
description:
The building's in flames!! In this puzzle platformer game, you must use water in multiple ways to save people from a building on fire. 

Controls

  • W, A, D - Move
  • E - Drink water
  • R - Restart Level
  • Space - Use Water
  • Esc- Pause/Resume Game

This is an entry to VimJam3, where the theme was "Turn Up The Heat" and the focus was "Multi-Use".
